tweet: Note to self: do not have car problems in elk season.  Put on calendar for next year.
I have been informed that men do not think straight during elk season... and things happen.
My mechanic appears to be very poor at communicating.  This is distressing.
I am writing the most unmarketable novel possible.  I really need to get new super powers.
Brain is full of the history of bathing.  Need to figure out societal pressures on bathing by age/rank.
